website_summaries.verdict: Toasty warm on cold nights, these keep feet comfortable inside the sleeping bag.
pros: Sized accurately for a range of foot sizes, these camp booties fit very comfortably
They stay toasty even in below-freezing temperatures
Ultralight and highly compressible, so they crush down small or roll up easily inside a sleeping bag
cons: No soles, so they can only be used inside the tent and sleeping bag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sleep booties.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister for sleep socks, we all just went on a trip that tipped into the low teens to zero degrees. Both nights she had to remove them later in the night as the warmer her feet that much. I was on the same trip and was frozen, im going to order some of these for me. Ps. These are not for walking on dirt or sand they for sleeping that is it. Miss using a product doesnt decrease the produces awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Siemon

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I love backpacking and I sleep very cold. My feet and backside get super cold (I've heard it's called "cold butt syndrome" LOL!) I've tried multiple socks, nalgenes with hot water in them, hand warmers in my socks, etc. These little booties are the best! Now if these guys would make a butt warmer, I would never sleep cold again. Pros: Pack down tiny Weigh nothing Incredibly insulating THE BEST COLD-FOOTED-BACKPACKER'S ITEM EVER! Cons: Zero! Note on sizing: I have tiny feet. I wear a boys/men 3 and a women's size 5.5. I got the size small booties. When I took them out of the packaging I was alarmed they wouldn't fit, but they were fine!
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Works for cold feet
customer_reviews.text: The booties are meant for sleeping/lounging not walking around the house. I wore wool socks with these and my feet warmed up quickly. I have cold feet and wool socks aren't enough to get my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Parent08

customer_reviews.title: Even Small runs big for some women.  No elastic...slips off in sleeping bag every time.
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty thin and not terribly warm in a tent or around camp, but great in the sleeping bag...until they come off, which is always, at least for me. It could be partly how big the Small is on me (Women’s 8 1/2 shoe size). But I think it’s mostly because they don’t have elastic at the top. I went and ordered another pair with elastic from 2 different brands, and both stayed on. I will see how they work for my cousin with 9 1/2 feet and if they’re still too big, I’ll give them to my aunt, who wears a 10-11. We all love the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality be careful selecting size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a long duration backpacking trip and the first pair was available in stock in mediately. I bought a medium, but that was much too big for a size 6 1/2 shoe size. I bought the small which was not in stock. Easy return process. I had to wait on shipping and they came the day I returned from my trip but otherwise nice quality and very warm. Looking forward to using on my next trip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, warm and soft, but fall off after you move.
customer_reviews.text: Why don't they add a drawstring to keep them on? Or velcro? I tried putting loose socks over them but they still came off. If I get tighter socks it will compress the air fluff and defeat the purpose. Back to the drawing board company!!! I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're a quiet sleeper
customer_reviews.text: They were very warm and cozy but if you move around much they will slip off as there is no drawstring or cuff to keep them in place. Super light weight! Made all the difference in keeping my toes warm while high-altitude camping (I can't sleep if my feet are cold!!)!
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Feet Warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these booties to help keep my frequently cold Raynaud's feet warm. With socks underneath, these really help, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyluvver

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these down booties to take on backpacking trips. They are very lightweight and warm. I put them on at night when I'm in my sleeping bag to keep my feet from being cold. They don't have a sole so I don't walk around the campsite in them. They are like very toasty socks.
customer_reviews.author: PCT HIKER

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These down booties are a good product and well made but sized a bit small even though I got a size larger than my shoe size. They barely fit but I will keep them, they're lighter than my old ones. I guess that's only important if you're a backpacker
customer_reviews.author: Wise Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Women's size 9 is about max for a medium
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I unpacked them, but the medium just about maxes out at a women's 9. I haven't used them yet but they seem well made for the price and pack small. The pair with bag weighs 2.5oz and the red is really nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: Love them !
customer_reviews.text: Not for walking around in. They are perfect for sleeping in my sleeping bag at 35 degrees. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wolfensparger

customer_reviews.title: cozy slippers.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these while snow camping and tossed in a toe warmer inside. They don't have a draw string, so I just folded over the top of one of the pairs of socks I was wearing while sleeping to keep them from slipping off. Looking forward to my next camping trip and totally bringing these with me!
customer_reviews.author: princessdammitt

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: A little big but haven’t tested outward they are I’m sure with socks they will fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm feel = Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these at first. I stolen them camping where the weather got to 42°. I cannot sleep if my feet are cold. I popped these on and slept like a baby. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: soooooooooo comfy! i wish it got colder more often so i had an excuse to wear these more

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely work!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality, I use them for want they are designed for sleeping in bed on a cold night or camping, they stay on my feet until I have warmed up and come off easily so it doesn’t disturb my sleeping to much. That’s a win win for me.
customer_reviews.author: DragonHDrider

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and kept my daughter's feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: Kept my daughter's feet warm temperature of 31 degrees. Perfect fit. Daughter wears 6 1/2 shoe and fits my wife 7 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I did like the price though and they pack down so small ...
customer_reviews.text: They hardly match up to a name brand winter down bootie. There's no bottom on them so you cannot walk around outside. They really aren't sufficient to wear in winter. I did like the price though and they pack down so small they are worth bringing camping. Much to my surprise they were warm
customer_reviews.author: Jim wallace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for sleeping in when hiking/camping. They work great to warm my feet and help me get a good nights rest. They took a few weeks to arrive in the mail, but am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but not as warm as expected
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable, but not as warm as I'd like. My feet still got cold while camping in 30 degree temps. Additional layers with the booties are needed. I also wish there was a draw string at the top around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Useless to me!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted for use on cold feet in bed. They were much too big...did t stay on!
customer_reviews.author: Trudi Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Booties well made.
customer_reviews.text: gifts for ladies with cold feet issues while canping,,, hoping to improve comfort while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: Smallest tiny things Ive ever seen. Barely any insulation. Dont bother buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Seungyong

customer_reviews.title: Nice down booties at reasonable price; sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet used these camping. However, they look like they will be a good addition to cooler-season nights in the sleeping bag. As a bikepacker, I'm all about ultralight. They run small compared to the sizing offered. I wear a 8.5 wide womens, 7 mens, 39-40 Euro, 25.5 Mondo. I just barely, barely fit into the size small which is advertised as size 7-9. If that is women's sizing, it is just barely accurate. If it is men's sizing, don't count on it. If I were to order again, I would order a medium, not a small.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Gal

customer_reviews.title: the fit is awful.
customer_reviews.text: better order two sizes larger...even then they will probably still not be comfy....
customer_reviews.author: k. m. morgan

product_meta.title: WIND HARD Winter Down Booties Socks Slippers Warm Soft Cozy for Outdoor Camping Sleeping Bag Indoor Down Filled Slipper Boots Ultralight 3 Size for Men Women
product_meta.description:
Filling:90% White Duck Down, The socks slippers of the down filling power is 650.Boots designed with fluffy down comfortable, breathable and Lightweight.

Material: Shell:410T Water Proof Nylon; Lining: 410T Soft Nylon Taffeta;

Using: This booties slippers are not designed to be walked in, perfect for camping, hiking, skiing, traveling, watching TV on sofa and sleeping when you are stationary, heating cold feet warm, suggest wear a sock inside to keep more warmer. 

Size: Blue, red, green, purple (US 7-US 9),Black Size (US 8-US 11.5), This Down Slippers suitable for moderate washed by hand, not suitable for machine washing, dry cleaning, can not be ironed and bleaching.

Weight: approx 75±5g With Storage bag. Please check size information carefully before purchasing order.
feature_bullets: Please check size information carefully before purchasing;
